    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public com.lycoon.clashapi.cocmodels.player.Player getPlayer(java.lang.String playerTag)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the player attached to the tag.

        The tag is a unique identifier each player has, in the form of #AAAA00.
        It is displayed under the nickname on player's profile.
        Parameters:
        playerTag - - String of the player's tag
        Returns:
        a Player object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the request to the game API failed
        See Also:
        Player

      • getClan

        public com.lycoon.clashapi.cocmodels.clan.ClanModel getClan(java.lang.String clanTag)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the clan attached to the tag.

        The tag is a unique identifier each clan has, in the form of #AAAA00.
        It is displayed under the clan name on clan's profile.
        Parameters:
        clanTag - - String of the clan's tag
        Returns:
        a ClanModel object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the request to the game API failed
        See Also:
        ClanModel

                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the CWL group in which the clan with the given tag is.

        It is displayed under the clan name on clan's profile.

      • getCWLWar

        public com.lycoon.clashapi.cocmodels.clanwar.WarInfo getCWLWar(java.lang.String warTag)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the individual CWL war associated to the given war tag.

        You can obtain individual CWL war tags from:
        ClashAPI.getCWLGroup(clanTag).getRounds(index).getWarTags(index)
        Parameters:
        warTag - - String of the war tag
        Returns:
        a WarInfo object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the request to the game API failed
        See Also:
        WarInfo
